content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #86082 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

I might suggest P-medium. Maybe even P-low. Like... yes, it shouldn't do that, but also you shouldn't be passing it a string with a null byte in it. Also, the error message on the ICE is about as clear as the error message that you'd add anyway, so the only problem is that it's an ICE and not a proper compiler error.
I think P-medium is fine. We see a lot of issues in this area i.e. invalid code that cause an ICE.
